original_title: Becky and the Lost Egg - The Mudlands
overview: Deep in some dangerous exotic jungle, Becky lives by her lonesome accompanied only by her egg.  As scary as the jungle becomes at night, Becky always has the egg to make her feel better. However upon waking up one fateful morning, Becky discovers her egg has been stolen! As a result, Becky then finds herself forced to venture forth into the jungle to find the egg and conquer her fears.
tagline: Becky doesn't have much in the scary jungle she calls home, but she does have her beloved egg. That is, until one night when disaster strikes.
title: Becky and the Lost Egg - The Mudlands
